titleStmt.title: A treatise of self-judging, in order to the worthy receiving of the Lords Supper. Together with a sermon of the generall day of judgement. / By Anthony Burgesse pastor of Sutton-Coldfield in Warwickshire.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664.
Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664. Demonstration of the day of judgement against atheists & hereticks.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. for T. Underhill at the Anchor, and M. Keinton at the Fountain, in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: "A demonstration of the day of judgement" has separate title page dated 1657, separate register and pagination.
Page ² [2] bears order to print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
